recipes.name: Chicken Adobo
recipes.description: Classic Filipino dish with chicken marinated in soy sauce and vinegar
instructions: Marinate chicken in soy sauce and vinegar for 30 minutes
Heat oil in a pan and sauté garlic and onion until fragrant
Add marinated chicken and cook until lightly browned
Pour in the marinade, add bay leaves and peppercorns
Simmer for 30-40 minutes until chicken is tender
Season with salt if needed and serve hot with rice

recipes.name: Pork Sinigang
recipes.description: Sour soup with pork and vegetables in tamarind broth
instructions: Boil pork in water for 30 minutes until tender
Add tomatoes and onion, simmer for 10 minutes
Add sinigang mix and stir well
Add string beans and cook for 5 minutes
Add kangkong and green chili
Season with salt and pepper, simmer for 2-3 minutes
Serve hot with rice

recipes.name: Beef Caldereta
recipes.description: Rich tomato-based stew with beef and vegetables
instructions: Sauté garlic and onion until fragrant
Add beef and brown on all sides
Pour in tomato sauce and add bay leaves
Simmer for 1 hour until beef is tender
Add potatoes and carrots, cook for 15 minutes
Add bell peppers and cook for 5 more minutes
Season with salt and pepper
Serve hot with rice

recipes.name: Fried Rice (Sinangag)
recipes.description: Filipino garlic fried rice, perfect for breakfast
instructions: Heat oil in a large pan or wok
Sauté garlic until golden brown
Add beaten eggs and scramble
Add rice and mix well to break up clumps
Season with salt and stir-fry for 3-5 minutes
Garnish with green onions and serve

recipes.name: Pancit Canton
recipes.description: Stir-fried egg noodles with vegetables and meat
instructions: Soak noodles in warm water until soft, drain
Heat oil and sauté garlic and onion
Add pork and chicken, cook until done
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 3 minutes
Add noodles, soy sauce, and oyster sauce
Toss everything together for 2-3 minutes
Season with salt and pepper, serve hot

recipes.name: Lumpia Shanghai
recipes.description: Filipino spring rolls with ground pork filling
instructions: Mix ground pork, carrots, onion, garlic, egg, salt, and pepper
Place 1 tablespoon of filling on each wrapper
Roll tightly and seal edges with water
Heat oil to 350°F (175°C)
Deep fry lumpia until golden brown
Drain on paper towels and serve with sweet and sour sauce
